definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: miss (a goal or way), go wrong, sin (NH id.; Aram. [[חֲטָא]] h.t.o0 As. ḫaṭû. Zim:BP 46; Sab. [[חַטא]], [[החַטא]] id., DHM in MV; Ar. xat.iy’a do wrong, commit a mistake or an error; II. make to miss the mark; IV. miss the mark, miss the way; Eth. xat.0: fail to find or have; sts. sin, esp. in deriv.)—

miss: [[לא תחטא]] thou shalt not miss anything Job 5:24, [[אָץ בְּרַגְּלַיִם חוֹטֵא]] Pr 19:2 one hastening with his feet misseth (the way or the goal); [[חׂטְאִי חׂמֵסנַפְשׁוֹ]] Pr 8:36 the one missing me (Wisdom) is one wronging himself (opp. [[מׂחְאִי]]); miss, i.e. endanger, one's life Pr 20:2, Hb Hab 2:10 acc. to De VB (others sub
q.v.)
sin, miss the goal or path of right and duty:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: against man, abs. Ex 5:16 (E), 1Sa 26:21, 2Sa 19:21, 1Ki 18:9, 2Ki 18:14; with [[לְ]] of the person against whom or towards whom one sins, Ge 40:1 (E), Ju Jdg 11:27, 1Sa 2:25, 1Sa 19:4, 1Sa 24:12, 1Ki 8:31 = 2Ch 6:22; [[מה חטאתי לך]] wherein have I sinned against thee ? Ge 20:9 (E) Je 37:18; with [[בְּ]], [[אל תחטאו בילד]] Ge 42:22 (E) Je 37:18; with [[בְּ]], [[אל תחטאו בילד]] Ge 42:22 (E) do not sin against the lad, against David 1Sa 19:4, 1Sa 19:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: elsewhere always against God, abs. Ex 20:20 (E), Ex 9:34 (J) Jos 7:11 (D) Le 4:3, Le 5:1, Le 5:11, Le 5:17, Le 5:17, Le 5:21, Le 5:23, Nu 16:22 (P), Ne 6:13, Job 1:5, Job 1:22, Job 7:20, Job 10:14, Job 24:19, Job 35:6, Ps 4:5, Ps 78:32, Is 43:27, Is 64:4, Je 2:35, La 5:7, Ez Eze 3:21, Eze 3:21, Eze 16:51, Eze 28:16, Eze 33:12, Ho 8:11 (del. We: Kl. Proph.) v:Ho 8:11, Ho 10:9, Ho 13:2; [[לא נתתי לחטא חכי]] I have not permitted my palate to sin Job 31:30; Pt. [[חׂטֵא]], used as adj., sinful nation Is Is 1:4, sinful person Ez Eze 18:4, Eze 18:20; but usually as noun, sinner Pr 11:31, Pr 13:22, Pr 14:21, Ec 2:26, Ec 7:26, Ec 8:12, Ec 9:2, Ec 9:18, Is 65:20. Sin is confessed: [[חָטָאנוּ]] we have sinned Nu 14:40, Nu 21:7 (E) Ju Jdg 10:15, 1Sa 12:10, 1Ki 8:47 = 2Ch 6:37, Ne 1:6, Ps 106:6, La 5:16, Da 9:5, Da 9:15; [[חטאתי]] I have sinned Ex 9:27, Nu 22:34 (J) 1Sa 15:24, 1Sa 15:30, 2Sa 24:10, 2Sa 24:17, 1Ch 21:8, 1Ch 21:17, Jb Job 33:27. Sin is universal: [[אין אדם אשׁר]] [[לא יחטא]] there is no man who sinneth not 1Ki 8:46 = 2Ch 6:36, [[כי אדם אין חדיק בארץ אשׁר יעשׂה טוב]] [[ולא יחטא]] Ec 7:20 for man there is none righteous in the earth who doeth good and sinneth not; with [[לְ]], against God Ge 20:6 (E), Ge 39:9 (J), Ex 32:33, Nu 32:33 (both JE), De 9:16, De 20:18, 1Sa 2:25, 1Sa 12:23, 1Sa 14:33, 1Sa 14:34, 1Ki 8:33, 1Ki 8:35, 1Ki 8:46, 1Ki 8:50 = 2Ch 6:24, 2Ch 6:26, 2Ch 6:36, 2Ch 6:39, 2Ki 17:7, Ho 4:7, Mic 7:9, Zep 1:17, Je 40:3, Je 44:23, Je 50:7, Je 50:14, Ez Eze 14:13, Is 42:24, Job 8:4, Ps 78:17, Ps 119:11, Ne 1:6; in confession [[חטאתי ל]] Ex 10:16, Jos 7:20 (J), 2Sa 12:13, Ps 41:5, Ps 51:6; [[חטאנו ל ]] De 1:41, Ju Jdg 10:10, 1Sa 7:6, Je 3:25, Je 8:14, Je 14:7, Je 14:20, Da 9:8, Da 9:11; with [[בְּ]] of instr., lips Job 2:10, tongue Ps 39:2; wherein Ez Eze 37:23, Le 4:23 (P), therein Le 5:22 (P); ellipsis of [[בְּ]] in pharse [[לי]] ´[[עונם אשׁר ח]] (their) iniquity wherein they sinned against me  Je 33:8, Je 33:8; [[בשׁגגה]] by error, unwittingly Le 4:2, Le 4:22, Le 4:27, Le 5:15, Nu 15:27, Nu 15:28 (all P); against thy judgements Ne 9:29; with [[עַל ]] with regard to Le 5:5, Nu 6:11(P) Ne 13:26; with cognate acc. [[חֲטָאָה]] ´[[ח]] Ex 32:30, Ex 32:31 (JE); [[חַטָּאתּ]] ´[[אשׁר ח]] Nu 12:11(J) Le 4:3, Le 4:28, Le 4:28, Le 4:35, Le 5:6, Le 5:10, Le 5:13 (all P) Le 19:22, Le 19:22 (H), De 9:18, 1Ki 14:16, 1Ki 14:22, 1Ki 15:30, 1Ki 16:13, 1Ki 16:19, 2Ki 21:17, Ez Eze 18:24, Eze 33:16; [[ל]] ´[[חטאת אשׁר ח]] Je 16:10, Ne 1:6; [[על]] ´[[חטאת אשׁר ח]] Le 4:14 (P); ´[[חֵטְא ח]] La 1:8; [[חֵטְא]] ´[[אשׁר ח]] De 19:15.

incur guilt, penalty by sin, forfeit: [[וחטאתי לך כל הימים]] Ge 43:9 I shall incur the blame of sinning against thee all my days, cf. Ge 44:32 (J); c. acc. [[חוֹטֵא נפשׁ]] for feiting oneself, one's life Pr 20:2, Hb Hab 2:10 acc. to most, yet v. sub

—´[[והביא אשׁמו אשׁר ח]] Le 5:7 he shall bring his trespass-offering which he has incurred by sin; ´[[קרבנו אשׁר ח]] Le 5:11; [[מן־הקדשׁ]] ´[[את אשׁר ח]] [[ישׁלּם]] v:Le 5:16 what he hath incurred by taking of the holy thing he shall pay.
bear loss: [[אָנׂכִי אֲחַטֶּנָּה]] I bare the loss of it Ge 31:39 (E; lit I let it be missing  ? poss. rd. [[אֲחֻטּנה]] I was made to miss it  ?).

make a sin-offering: c. sf. referring to [[שׁעיר]] Le 9:15 (P); to sin-offering Le 6:19 (P); [[על המזבח]] upon the altar Ex 29:36 (P; not cleanse the altar RV); [[את דמם המזבחה]] ´[[ח]] 2Ch 29:24 made a sin-offering with their blood on the altar.

purity from sin: the altar, by putting the blood of the sin-offering on its horns, Le 8:15 (P), Ez Eze 43:20, Eze 43:22, Eze 43:22, Eze 43:23; the sanctuary, by applying to it the blood of the sin-offering Ez Eze 45:18.

purity from uncleanness: the house of the leper by application of the mixture of living water and blood of the bird Le 14:49, Le 14:52 (P); a person, by application of then mixture of living water and ashes of the red heifer Nu 19:19 (P), by sprinkling with a hyssop spring Ps 51:9.
miss the mark: [[קׂלֵעֵ בָּאֶבֶן]] [[אֶל־הַשַּׂעְרָה וְלאׁ יַחֲטִא]] Ju Jdg 20:16 slinging with stones at an hair and would not miss.

induce or cause to sin: with acc. Ex 23:33(JE), Ne 13:26; elsewh. in the phrase [[החטיא את ישׂראל]] (he) caused Israel to sin 1Ki 14:16, 1Ki 15:26, 1Ki 15:30, 1Ki 15:34, 1Ki 16:2, 1Ki 16:13, 1Ki 16:19, 1Ki 16:26, 1Ki 21:22, 1Ki 22:53, 2Ki 3:3, 2Ki 10:29, 2Ki 10:31, 2Ki 13:2, 2Ki 13:6, 2Ki 13:11, 2Ki 14:24, 2Ki 15:9, 2Ki 15:18, 2Ki 15:24, 2Ki 15:28, 2Ki 23:15; c. sf. ref. to Isr. 2Ki 17:21; [[את יהודה]] 2Ki 21:11, 2Ki 21:16, Je 32:35 (sts. c. 2nd acc.—[[חטאת]], or [[אשׁר]] ref. to [[חטאת]]:—1Ki 15:26, 1Ki 15:34, 1Ki 16:26, 2Ki 17:21, 2Ki 21:16; peob. also 1Ki 14:16, 1Ki 15:30, 1Ki 16:13; no 2nd acc. 1Ki 16:2, 1Ki 16:19, 1Ki 21:22, 1Ki 22:53, 2Ki 21:11, 2Ki 23:15, Je 32:35; the rest are ambiguous).

bring into guilt, condemnation, punishment: [[מחטיאי אדם]] Is 29:21 who bring a man into condemnation; [[לא תחטיא את הארץ]] De 24:4 thou shalt not bring the land into guilt; [[אל תתן]] [[את־פיך לחטיא את־בשׂרך]] Ec 5:4 do not permit thy mouth to bring thy flesh into punishment.
miss oneself, lose oneself, fig. for be bewildered, beside oneself, [[מִשְּׁבָרִים יִתְחַטָּאוּ]] Job 41:17 by reason of consternation they are beside themselves (‖[[יגורו]] are afraid).
purity oneself from uncleanness, only in P:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Levites Nu 8:21.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: those in contact with the dead Nu 19:12, Nu 19:13, Nu 19:20, Nu 31:19, Nu 31:20; with [[בְּ]], [[בְּמֵי נִּדָּה]] Nu 31:23; by a mixture of ashes of the red heifer with fresh water Nu 19:12.
